fulltext:
NGUYEN XUAN NGUYEN 
Web Developer 
CONTACT: 
EXPERIENCE: 
EyeQ Tech – Viet Nam 
From 9/2018 – 9/2019 
Web developer 
• 
Work as a fresher full-stack web developer. 
• 
Maintain and implement new features for a web application. 
• 
Be involved in some Computer Vision project. 
• 
Responsible for designing and developing a health-check web application for 
the company’s server 
TECHNICAL SKILLS: 
• 
Programming languages: 
C/C++, Java, Javascript 
HTML5, CSS3. 
• 
Frameworks/ Platforms:NodeJS, ReactJS, Redux, Webpack, Redis, jQuery, 
Twitter Bootstrap. 
• 
Database Management Systems: SQL Server, MySQL, NoSQL (MongoDB). 
• 
Development Platforms: 
Git, Shell, Crontab, Docker. 
EDUCATION: 
Ho Chi Minh University of Science 
• 
Bachelor’s Degree, Faculty of Information Technology ( Software ). 
OTHER INFORMATION: 
• 
I also participate in stackoverflow: 
https://stackoverflow.com/users/10627944/you-know-who 
• 
Recently, translating stories on Quora ( a question-and-answer site) from 
English to Vietnamese then post it in a group on Facebook has name “Quora 
Việt Nam” is my new favorite thing to do. 
• 
I also have some project with friends: 
• 
Android Gallery App (2019) 
• 
News website [https://th16news-hcmus.herokuapp.com/] – written 
by JavaScript
